<Link id="l03202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: The correctness of this analysis depends on the fact that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// following 2 sets will stop changing after some point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &quot;Change&quot; here means that their size changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The size of each set is monotonically increasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (we only add items to them) and it is upper bounded by the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions in the processed function (we can never save more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// elements in either set than this number). Hence, at some point,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// they will stop increasing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Consequently, at some point, both sets will have stopped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// changing, effectively making the analysis reach a fixpoint.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: These 2 sets are disjoint and an instruction can be considered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// one of 3 things:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1) Known to cause UB (AAUndefinedBehavior could prove it) and put it in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    the KnownUBInsts set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2) Assumed to cause UB (in every updateImpl, AAUndefinedBehavior</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    has a reason to assume it).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3) Assumed to not cause UB. very other instruction - AAUndefinedBehavior</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    could not find a reason to assume or prove that it can cause UB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    hence it assumes it doesn&#39;t. We have a set for these instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    so that we don&#39;t reprocess them in every update.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    Note however that instructions in this set may cause UB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3224"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3225"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A set of all live instructions &#95;known&#95; to cause UB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3227" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-attributorattributes-cpp-/aaundefinedbehaviorimpl/#ad88e8706977b3f4bec9f1dffb90f4dd7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-attributorattributes-cpp-/aaundefinedbehaviorimpl/#ad88e8706977b3f4bec9f1dffb90f4dd7">KnownUBInsts</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A set of all the (live) instructions that are assumed to &#95;not&#95; cause UB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a> AssumedNoUBInsts;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Should be called on updates in which if we&#39;re processing an instruction</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - If the value is known but undef, then consider it UB.</span></CodeLine>
